Ask yourself for the reasons for not keeping the timeline. What can you do to become better? Do you need help? Do you have problems? Discuss with your boss what can be done to support your improvement.

MODELATTRIBUTES.ATTRIBUTE: Manage Service Conference is a subprocess dedicate to activate the service conference and take a decision. In particular, service conference is a meeting in which all involved participants (both municipality offices, third party administrations, and entrepreneur) discuss about the case and decide if the business activity is acceptable or not. In particular this activity the SUAP office announces the Service Conference to the third party administrations , runs the Service Conference and receives the decision taken.

INSTANCE.name: Service Conference Activation
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: EXPR expr:(set(targets, ctobjs("Is inside")), cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=0,"black", (cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=1,aval (VAL ctobjs("Is inside"), "Fontcolor"), ( set(tk,token(targets,0," ")), set(t,VAL (copy(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),search(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), fortok(x,targets," ", ( set(c,VAL (copy(aval(VAL x, "Position"),search(aval(VAL x, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), cond(c>=t,(set(res,x),set(t,c)),"") )), aval (VAL res, "Fontcolor") )) ) )) val:error:"[acoexpar-02] Attribute \"Fontcolor\" (Lane) does not exist! \"fontcolor\" (Start Event)"
This is a starting point for the Service Conference.

INSTANCE.name: Activate Service Conference
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:12.5cm y:18cm w:3.36cm h:1.8cm index:2

EXPR expr:(set(targets, ctobjs("Is inside")), cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=0,"black", (cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=1,aval (VAL ctobjs("Is inside"), "Fontcolor"), ( set(tk,token(targets,0," ")), set(t,VAL (copy(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),search(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), fortok(x,targets," ", ( set(c,VAL (copy(aval(VAL x, "Position"),search(aval(VAL x, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), cond(c>=t,(set(res,x),set(t,c)),"") )), aval (VAL res, "Fontcolor") )) ) )) val:error:"[acoexpar-02] Attribute \"Fontcolor\" (Lane) does not exist! \"fontcolor\" (Task)"

In this activity the SUAP office announces the Service Conference calling each participant.
The service conference is always convened when it is necessary to acquire understandings, agreements, authorizations or assets however named of other administrations. In this case the conference than be convened: a) When the documents of assent are not issued within thirty days from the request; b) When, within the deadline of thirty days from the request, the dissent of one or more of the administrations consulted has occurred.
The conference is convened also at the request of the party concerned, when the activity of the private party is subordinate to documents of consent, however named, falling under the competence of several public administrations.
Finally, the conference can be convened for the simultaneous review of interests involved in several connected administrative procedures, concerning the same activities or results. In this case the convening of the conference by the administration looking after the predominant interest can be requested by any other administration involved.

INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: EXPR expr:(set(targets, ctobjs("Is inside")), cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=0,"black", (cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=1,aval (VAL ctobjs("Is inside"), "Fontcolor"), ( set(tk,token(targets,0," ")), set(t,VAL (copy(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),search(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), fortok(x,targets," ", ( set(c,VAL (copy(aval(VAL x, "Position"),search(aval(VAL x, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), cond(c>=t,(set(res,x),set(t,c)),"") )), aval (VAL res, "Fontcolor") )) ) )) val:error:"[acoexpar-02] Attribute \"Fontcolor\" (Lane) does not exist! \"fontcolor\" (End Event)"
This is the end point for the Service Conference. The subprocess is completed and a decision is taken.

INSTANCE.name: Instance
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: It is the data object representing all the documents and certificates that the entrepreneur sends to the SUAP office. It is composed by a set of artifacts that change due to the entrepreneur request. Relevant documents are following reported. SCIA Form is mandatory relevant document where all the personal data of the entrepreneur and information about the type of commercial activity are described. This is a very complex data-object composed by several fields and attachments some of them are mandatory and other are optional. In some cases other documents are also relevant. Self-Declaration of moral and professional requirements is another mandatory document where the entrepreneur declares that he/she is qualified to open the commercial activity. The Residence of Permit is an optional document and it has to be provided only in case the entrepreneur is a foreigner. It is a certificate that enables foreign people to stay and work in EU countries. Declaration of other owners is a relevant document that has to be provided by the entrepreneur in the case the build under analysis is owned also by other people.

IREF.tmodelname: 03 - Document and Knowledge model Titolo Unico

INSTANCE.name: Service Conference
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:2cm y:6cm w:25.5cm h:4cm index:11

ATTRIBUTE.name: Rotate the visualised values by 90 degrees

INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: These pool represent the development of the works during the Service Conference. The work of the conferences, promoted by the SUAP office is public, unless otherwise decided with justification. Those who intend to participate in the work of the conferences inform the SUAP accordingly, also electronically, at least forty eight hours before the meeting. The subject proposing the project being discussed participates in the conference, without voting rights. Publication of the works of the conferences promoted by the local authorities can be arranged by the relevant administration. The administrations in charge of the management of eventual public measures of special terms can participate in the conference, without voting rights. The conference adopts the decisions relative to the organization of its own work by majority of those present. In case of a tie vote, the vote of the representative of the relevant administration prevails.

INSTANCE.name: Sportello Comprensoriale or Sportello Municipale
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:2cm y:14cm w:25cm h:6.5cm index:12

INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: This pool generalize the organization where the SUAP office can be find. It can be part of the municipality, in this case is called sportello municipale, or be part of the organization that provides the aggregated SUAP, in this case is called sportello comprensoriale.

INSTANCE.name: SUAP Office
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:5cm y:14cm w:22cm h:6.5cm index:13

SUAP office can be considered as a mediator among entrepreneurs and PAs. It means, that in case an entrepreneur wants to start a manufacturing activity, he/she needs to contact just the SUAP office that is in charge to forward the request to all the other involved administrations. SUAP office can be organized as an office of the municipality or it is possible that small municipalities decide to delegate such responsibility to a consortium that provide the SUAP office for more than one municipality.

MODELATTRIBUTES.ATTRIBUTE: Several third party administrations are involved in the Titolo Unico business process. They are external Public Administration delegated to do some checks. This subprocess refers to the activities related to their partecipation. In this activity the SUAP office checks the documents and certificates in order to verify that there are no restrictions. At the same time, it asks the third party administration to do the same.

INSTANCE.name: SUAP Office
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:3cm y:8cm w:33cm h:15.5cm index:2

SUAP office can be considered as a mediator among entrepreneurs and PAs. It means, that in case an entrepreneur wants to start a manufacturing activity, he/she needs to contact just the SUAP office that is in charge to forward the request to all the other involved administrations. SUAP office can be organized as an office of the municipality or it is possible that small municipalities decide to delegate such responsibility to a consortium that provide the SUAP office for more than one municipality.

INSTANCE.name: Instance
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: It is the data object representing all the documents and certificates that the entrepreneur sends to the SUAP office. It is composed by a set of artifacts that change due to the entrepreneur request. Relevant documents are following reported. SCIA Form is mandatory relevant document where all the personal data of the entrepreneur and information about the type of commercial activity are described. This is a very complex data-object composed by several fields and attachments some of them are mandatory and other are optional. In some cases other documents are also relevant. Self-Declaration of moral and professional requirements is another mandatory document where the entrepreneur declares that he/she is qualified to open the commercial activity. The Residence of Permit is an optional document and it has to be provided only in case the entrepreneur is a foreigner. It is a certificate that enables foreign people to stay and work in EU countries. Declaration of other owners is a relevant document that has to be provided by the entrepreneur in the case the build under analysis is owned also by other people.

MODELATTRIBUTES.ATTRIBUTE: Titolo Unico is activated when the entrepreneur applies for opening the activity and he/she has to wait for feedback by the administration before starting the business activity. The application has to be electronically delivered, by the entrepreneur, to the SUAP office. Such application consists in reporting details activity, location, etc. SUAP office forwards the request to the municipality offices and third parties administrations involved in the verification activity. They check the correctness of the request and provide feedbacks to the SUAP office in order to clarify if the request is acceptable or not. Municipality offices and third parties can also ask the entrepreneur for some integration if some data are missing or wrong. In case the request is particularly complex to manage, at any time SUAP office can organize the Service Conference that is a meeting in which all involved participants (municipality offices, third party administrations, and entrepreneur) discuss about the case and decide if the business activity is acceptable or not. At the end, the acceptance or the rejection for the request to start the activity is provided to the entrepreneur.

INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: This pool generalize the organization where the SUAP office can be find. It can be part of the municipality, in this case is called sportello municipale, or be part of the organization that provides the aggregated SUAP, in this case is called sportello comprensoriale.

INSTANCE.name: SUAP Office
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:3.5cm y:9cm w:63.5cm h:12.5cm index:2

SUAP office can be considered as a mediator among entrepreneurs and PAs. It means, that in case an entrepreneur wants to start a manufacturing activity, he/she needs to contact just the SUAP office that is in charge to forward the request to all the other involved administrations. SUAP office can be organized as an office of the municipality or it is possible that small municipalities decide to delegate such responsibility to a consortium that provide the SUAP office for more than one municipality.

INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:21.5cm y:13cm w:3.36cm h:1.8cm index:4

EXPR expr:(set(targets, ctobjs("Is inside")), cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=0,"black", (cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=1,aval (VAL ctobjs("Is inside"), "Fontcolor"), ( set(tk,token(targets,0," ")), set(t,VAL (copy(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),search(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), fortok(x,targets," ", ( set(c,VAL (copy(aval(VAL x, "Position"),search(aval(VAL x, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), cond(c>=t,(set(res,x),set(t,c)),"") )), aval (VAL res, "Fontcolor") )) ) )) val:error:"[acoexpar-02] Attribute \"Fontcolor\" (Lane) does not exist! \"fontcolor\" (Sub-Process)"

Several third party administrations are involved in the Titolo Unico business process. They are external Public Administration delegated to do some checks. This subprocess refers to the activities related to their partecipation. In this activity the SUAP office checks the documents and certificates in order to verify that there are no restrictions. At the same time, it asks the third party administration to do the same.

INSTANCE.name: Manage Service Conference
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:27.5cm y:17.5cm w:3.36cm h:1.8cm index:5

EXPR expr:(set(targets, ctobjs("Is inside")), cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=0,"black", (cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=1,aval (VAL ctobjs("Is inside"), "Fontcolor"), ( set(tk,token(targets,0," ")), set(t,VAL (copy(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),search(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), fortok(x,targets," ", ( set(c,VAL (copy(aval(VAL x, "Position"),search(aval(VAL x, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), cond(c>=t,(set(res,x),set(t,c)),"") )), aval (VAL res, "Fontcolor") )) ) )) val:error:"[acoexpar-02] Attribute \"Fontcolor\" (Lane) does not exist! \"fontcolor\" (Sub-Process)"

Manage Service Conference is a subprocess dedicate to activate the service conference and take a decision. In particular, service conference is a meeting in which all involved participants (both municipality offices, third party administrations, and entrepreneur) discuss about the case and decide if the business activity is acceptable or not. In particular this activity the SUAP office announces the Service Conference to the third party administrations , runs the Service Conference and receives the decision taken.
Service Conference is activated when: (i) entrepreneurs, owners of the instance, or an intermediate business agency who represents them asks the SUAP to do it; (ii) it is required by a specific national or regional law; (iii) the SUAP has required to a third party (that has received the request) a response since 30 days; (iv) the SUAP is dealing with a third partys sub-proceeding which, by its nature, takes more than 90 days to conclude (v) the SUAP still need to acquire an agreement, a clearance act, a concert or an assent from one or more involved different administrations; (vi) a whoever citizen, interested in the results of the proceeding, asks the SUAP to do it; (vii) the SUAP has required to a third party (that has received the request) a response since 2 days; (viii) the SUAP is dealing with a third partys sub-proceeding which, by its nature, takes 30 days to conclude; (ix) the SUAP has already received positive responses from each other local authorities involved.

INSTANCE.name: Reject Application?
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: EXPR expr:(set(targets, ctobjs("Is inside")), cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=0,"black", (cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=1,aval (VAL ctobjs("Is inside"), "Fontcolor"), ( set(tk,token(targets,0," ")), set(t,VAL (copy(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),search(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), fortok(x,targets," ", ( set(c,VAL (copy(aval(VAL x, "Position"),search(aval(VAL x, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), cond(c>=t,(set(res,x),set(t,c)),"") )), aval (VAL res, "Fontcolor") )) ) )) val:error:"[acoexpar-02] Attribute \"Fontcolor\" (Lane) does not exist! \"fontcolor\" (Exclusive Gateway)"

This is a decision point. The XOR-split gateway is evaluated, if the application need to be reject the sequence flow with the label yes (task send communication of not-admissibility) is activated othewise it is activated the sequence flow with the label not (task check application).

INSTANCE.name: Entrepreneur
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:.45cm y:2cm w:66.5cm h:4cm index:35

ATTRIBUTE.name: Rotate the visualised values by 90 degrees

INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: To start a new company or expand your business in another EU country you can get in touch with the relevant national contact point and find out about the rules that apply in that specific country. As an EU citizen you are entitled to: a. set up your own business (even as a sole trader) in any EU country (or Iceland, Norway or Liechtenstein), b. set up a subsidiary branch of an existing EU-based business that is already registered in one EU country. Here the entrepreneur is the citizen that want to certify the start of an activity according to the Italian rules. Eventually the pool represent an intermediate acting on behalf of the entrepreneur.

INSTANCE.name: Intermediate Event (boundary)-28800
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: Inconsistency in the integration are present.

INSTANCE.name: Instance
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: It is the data object representing all the documents and certificates that the entrepreneur sends to the SUAP office. It is composed by a set of artifacts that change due to the entrepreneur request. Relevant documents are following reported. SCIA Form is mandatory relevant document where all the personal data of the entrepreneur and information about the type of commercial activity are described. This is a very complex data-object composed by several fields and attachments some of them are mandatory and other are optional. In some cases other documents are also relevant. Self-Declaration of moral and professional requirements is another mandatory document where the entrepreneur declares that he/she is qualified to open the commercial activity. The Residence of Permit is an optional document and it has to be provided only in case the entrepreneur is a foreigner. It is a certificate that enables foreign people to stay and work in EU countries. Declaration of other owners is a relevant document that has to be provided by the entrepreneur in the case the build under analysis is owned also by other people.

CHAPTER "Business Process Diagram Attributes" ATTR "Name" write-protected ATTR "Contact person" ATTR "Author" write-protected ATTR "Language (BPMN)" ATTR "ExpressionLanguage" ATTR "QueryLanguage" ATTR "Creation date" write-protected ATTR "Date last changed" write-protected ATTR "Documentation (Model)" ATTR "State"
GROUP "Copyright" ATTR "Copyright info" ATTR "Copyright info position" ENDGROUP
CHAPTER "Process Attributes" ATTR "Name" write-protected ATTR "Process Term" ATTR "ProcessType" ATTR "Status" ATTR "Assignments" lines:5 ATTR "Properties (BPMN)" lines:5 ATTR "AdHoc" ctrltype:check checked-value:"Yes" unchecked-value:"No" GROUP "AdHoc = True" ATTR "AdHocOrdering" ATTR "AdHocCompletionCondition" ENDGROUP ATTR "SuppressJoinFailure" ctrltype:check checked-value:"Yes" unchecked-value:"No" ATTR "EnableInstanceCompensation" ctrltype:check checked-value:"Yes" unchecked-value:"No" ATTR "Categories (Process)" ATTR "Documentation (Process)"
CHAPTER "Pool Attributes" GROUP "Common Graphical Object Attributes" ATTR "Name" write-protected ATTR "Categories (Pool)" ATTR "Documentation (Pool)" ENDGROUP GROUP "Common Swimlane Attributes" ATTR "Pool Term" ENDGROUP GROUP "Pool Attributes" ATTR "ParticipantType" ATTR "Role" ATTR "Entity" ATTR "BoundaryVisible" ctrltype:check checked-value:"Yes" unchecked-value:"No" write-protected ENDGROUP

GROUP "Process relevance" ATTR "Auditing" ctrltype:check checked-value:"Yes" unchecked-value:"No" ATTR "Monitoring" ctrltype:check checked-value:"Yes" unchecked-value:"No" ENDGROUP

CHAPTER "System attributes" ATTR "Author" write-protected ATTR "Creation date" write-protected ATTR "Last user" write-protected # ATTR "Date last changed from" write-protected ATTR "Date last changed" write-protected ATTR "Number of objects and relations" write-protected ATTR "Context of version" write-protected
CHAPTER "People-like view" ATTR "Action" ATTR "People-like view"
CHAPTER "BAR Display" ATTR "BAR Display active" ctrltype: check checked-value: "Yes" unchecked-value: "No" AVAL s_Aktiv: "BAR Display active" ATTR "Modelling direction" ctrltype: radio enabled: (s_Aktiv = "Yes") ATTR "Modelling_size"
GROUP "Responsible for execution" ATTR "Responsible for execution_display" ctrltype: check checked-value: "Yes" unchecked-value: "No" enabled: (s_Aktiv = "Yes") AVAL s_Responsible_for_execution_display: "Responsible for execution_display" ATTR "Responsible for execution_color" dialog: color enabled: ((s_Aktiv = "Yes") AND (s_Responsible_for_execution_display = "Yes")) ATTR "Responsible for execution_size" ENDGROUP
GROUP "Accountable for approving results" ATTR "Accountable for approving results_display" ctrltype: check checked-value: "Yes" unchecked-value: "No" enabled: (s_Aktiv = "Yes") AVAL s_Accountableforapprovingresults_display: "Actor_display" ATTR "Accountable for approving results_color" dialog: color enabled: ((s_Aktiv = "Yes") AND (s_Accountableforapprovingresults_display = "Yes")) ATTR "Accountable for approving results_size" ENDGROUP
GROUP "Cooperation/participation" ATTR "Cooperation/participation_display" ctrltype: check checked-value: "Yes" unchecked-value: "No" enabled: (s_Aktiv = "Yes") AVAL s_Cooperationparticipation_display: "Cooperation/participation_display" ATTR "Cooperation/participation_color" dialog: color enabled: ((s_Aktiv = "Yes") AND (s_Cooperationparticipation_display = "Yes")) ATTR "Cooperation/participation_size" ENDGROUP
GROUP "To inform" ATTR "To inform_display" ctrltype: check checked-value: "Yes" unchecked-value: "No" enabled: (s_Aktiv = "Yes") AVAL s_Toinform_display: "To inform_display" ATTR "To inform_color" dialog: color enabled: ((s_Aktiv = "Yes") AND (s_Toinform_display = "Yes")) ATTR "To inform_size" ENDGROUP
GROUP "Knowledge Product" ATTR "Knowledge Product_display" ctrltype: check checked-value: "Yes" unchecked-value: "No" enabled: (s_Aktiv = "Yes") AVAL s_KnowledgeProduct_display: "Knowledge Product_display" ATTR "Knowledge Product_color" dialog: color enabled: ((s_Aktiv = "Yes") AND (s_KnowledgeProduct_display = "Yes")) ATTR "Knowledge Product_size" ENDGROUP
GROUP "Documents and Resources" ATTR "Documents and Resources_display" ctrltype: check checked-value: "Yes" unchecked-value: "No" enabled: (s_Aktiv = "Yes") AVAL s_DocumentsandResources_display: "Documents and Resources_display" ATTR "Documents and Resources_color" dialog: color enabled: ((s_Aktiv = "Yes") AND (s_DocumentsandResources_display = "Yes")) ATTR "Documents and Resources_size" ENDGROUP
GROUP "Incoming Data Object" ATTR "Incoming Data Object_display" ctrltype: check checked-value: "Yes" unchecked-value: "No" enabled: (s_Aktiv = "Yes") AVAL s_IncomingDataObject_display: "Incoming Data Object_display" ATTR "Incoming Data Object_color" dialog: color enabled: ((s_Aktiv = "Yes") AND (s_IncomingDataObject_display = "Yes")) ATTR "Incoming Data Object_size" ENDGROUP
GROUP "Outgoing Data Object" ATTR "Outgoing Data Object_display" ctrltype: check checked-value: "Yes" unchecked-value: "No" enabled: (s_Aktiv = "Yes") AVAL s_OutgoingDataObject_display: "Outgoing Data Object_display" ATTR "Outgoing Data Object_color" dialog: color enabled: ((s_Aktiv = "Yes") AND (s_OutgoingDataObject_display = "Yes")) ATTR "Outgoing Data Object_size" ENDGROUP
GROUP "Description" ATTR "Description_display" ctrltype: check checked-value: "Yes" unchecked-value: "No" enabled: (s_Aktiv = "Yes") AVAL s_Description_display: "Description_display" ATTR "Description_color" dialog: color enabled: ((s_Aktiv = "Yes") AND (s_Description_display = "Yes")) ATTR "Description_size" ENDGROUP

INSTANCE.name: SUAP Office
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:34.5cm y:12cm w:2.4cm h:1.5cm index:54

EXPR expr:(set(targets, ctobjs("Is inside")), cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=0,"black", (cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=1,aval (VAL ctobjs("Is inside"), "Fontcolor"), ( set(tk,token(targets,0," ")), set(t,VAL (copy(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),search(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), fortok(x,targets," ", ( set(c,VAL (copy(aval(VAL x, "Position"),search(aval(VAL x, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), cond(c>=t,(set(res,x),set(t,c)),"") )), aval (VAL res, "Fontcolor") )) ) )) val:"black"

SUAP office can be considered as a mediator among entrepreneurs and PAs. It means, that in case an entrepreneur wants to start a manufacturing activity, he/she needs to contact just the SUAP office that is in charge to forward the request to all the other involved administrations. SUAP office can be organized as an office of the municipality or it is possible that small municipalities decide to delegate such responsibility to a consortium that provide the SUAP office for more than one municipality.

INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: EXPR expr:(set(targets, ctobjs("Is inside")), cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=0,"black", (cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=1,aval (VAL ctobjs("Is inside"), "Fontcolor"), ( set(tk,token(targets,0," ")), set(t,VAL (copy(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),search(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), fortok(x,targets," ", ( set(c,VAL (copy(aval(VAL x, "Position"),search(aval(VAL x, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), cond(c>=t,(set(res,x),set(t,c)),"") )), aval (VAL res, "Fontcolor") )) ) )) val:"black"

SUAP office can be considered as a mediator among entrepreneurs and PAs. It means, that in case an entrepreneur wants to start a manufacturing activity, he/she needs to contact just the SUAP office that is in charge to forward the request to all the other involved administrations. SUAP office can be organized as an office of the municipality or it is possible that small municipalities decide to delegate such responsibility to a consortium that provide the SUAP office for more than one municipality.

INSTANCE.name: Instance
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: EXPR expr:(set(targets, ctobjs("Is inside")), cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=0,"black", (cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=1,aval (VAL ctobjs("Is inside"), "Fontcolor"), ( set(tk,token(targets,0," ")), set(t,VAL (copy(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),search(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), fortok(x,targets," ", ( set(c,VAL (copy(aval(VAL x, "Position"),search(aval(VAL x, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), cond(c>=t,(set(res,x),set(t,c)),"") )), aval (VAL res, "Fontcolor") )) ) )) val:error:"[acoexpar-02] Attribute \"Fontcolor\" (Group) does not exist! \"fontcolor\" (Document)"

It is the data object representing all the documents and certificates that the entrepreneur sends to the SUAP office. It is composed by a set of artifacts that change due to the entrepreneur request. Relevant documents are following reported. SCIA Form is mandatory relevant document where all the personal data of the entrepreneur and information about the type of commercial activity are described. This is a very complex data-object composed by several fields and attachments some of them are mandatory and other are optional. In some cases other documents are also relevant. Self-Declaration of moral and professional requirements is another mandatory document where the entrepreneur declares that he/she is qualified to open the commercial activity. The Residence of Permit is an optional document and it has to be provided only in case the entrepreneur is a foreigner. It is a certificate that enables foreign people to stay and work in EU countries. Declaration of other owners is a relevant document that has to be provided by the entrepreneur in the case the build under analysis is owned also by other people.

INSTANCE.name: ModelSet - SUAP Titolo Unico
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: EXPR expr:(set(targets, ctobjs("Is inside")), cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=0,"black", (cond (tokcnt(targets," ")=1,aval (VAL ctobjs("Is inside"), "Fontcolor"), ( set(tk,token(targets,0," ")), set(t,VAL (copy(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),search(aval(VAL tk, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), fortok(x,targets," ", ( set(c,VAL (copy(aval(VAL x, "Position"),search(aval(VAL x, "Position"),"index",0)+6,-1))), cond(c>=t,(set(res,x),set(t,c)),"") )), aval (VAL res, "Fontcolor") )) ) )) val:"black"

Here the learner can find all the models useful to better perform the activity related to SUAP. It refers to the activities that the Italian Public Administrations have to put in place in order to permit entrepreneurs to set up new companies or generally to organize business activities. The model refer to a specific scenario related to the Titolo Unico. It is introduced by Art. 7 of the Italian Law D.P.R. 160/2010.

IREF.tmodelname: 03 - Document and Knowledge model Titolo Unico
